statements: SELECT * FROM network_configurations;
SELECT network_name, network_address, subnet_mask FROM network_configurations WHERE id = 1;
SELECT id, network_name, gateway FROM network_configurations WHERE network_address LIKE '192.%';
SELECT * FROM network_configurations WHERE subnet_mask = '255.255.255.0';
SELECT network_name, gateway FROM network_configurations ORDER BY id DESC;
SELECT * FROM network_configurations WHERE network_name = 'LAN' ORDER BY id DESC;
SELECT network_name, network_address, subnet_mask FROM network_configurations WHERE id > 100 AND gateway <> '192.168.1.1';
SELECT id, network_name, network_address, subnet_mask FROM network_configurations WHERE subnet_mask LIKE '%255';
SELECT network_address, gateway FROM network_configurations WHERE network_name IN ('LAN', 'WAN') ORDER BY network_address ASC;
SELECT * FROM network_configurations WHERE gateway IS NULL OR gateway = '0.0.0.0';
SELECT * FROM network_configurations WHERE id = 1;
SELECT name, ip_address, gateway FROM network_configurations WHERE subnet_mask = '255.255.255.0';
SELECT * FROM firewall_rules WHERE protocol = 'TCP' ORDER BY port DESC;
SELECT rule_name, source_ip, destination_ip FROM firewall_rules WHERE port BETWEEN 1000 AND 2000;
SELECT id, ip_address FROM network_configurations WHERE gateway = '192.168.1.1';
SELECT * FROM network_configurations WHERE id = 1;
SELECT name, ip_address FROM network_configurations WHERE gateway = '192.168.1.1';
SELECT * FROM firewall_rules WHERE protocol = 'TCP' AND port = 80;
SELECT rule_name, source_ip, destination_ip FROM firewall_rules WHERE port > 1024;
SELECT DISTINCT gateway FROM network_configurations;
SELECT id, name FROM network_configurations;
SELECT * FROM firewall_rules WHERE action = 'ALLOW';
SELECT timestamp, status FROM monitoring_data WHERE status = 'CRITICAL';
SELECT ip_address, subnet_mask FROM network_configurations WHERE id = 1;
SELECT rule_name, protocol, port FROM firewall_rules WHERE protocol = 'TCP';
SELECT * FROM network_configurations WHERE ip_address = '192.168.1.1';
SELECT name, ip_address FROM network_configurations WHERE subnet_mask = '255.255.255.0';
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM firewall_rules;
SELECT protocol, port, action FROM firewall_rules ORDER BY rule_id DESC;
SELECT * FROM monitoring_data WHERE status = 'offline' ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT * FROM network_configurations;
SELECT id, hostname, ip_address FROM network_configurations ORDER BY hostname DESC;
SELECT * FROM firewall_rules WHERE protocol = 'TCP';
SELECT rule_name, source_ip, destination_ip FROM firewall_rules WHERE port = 80;
SELECT device_name, device_type, manufacturer FROM network_devices;
SELECT * FROM network_configurations WHERE is_active = true;
SELECT hostname, ip_address FROM network_configurations WHERE gateway_ip = '192.168.0.1';
SELECT rule_name, rule_description, port FROM firewall_rules WHERE protocol = 'TCP' ORDER BY rule_name ASC;
SELECT * FROM firewall_logs WHERE action_taken = 'BLOCK' AND source_ip = '10.0.0.1' ORDER BY timestamp DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT device_name, manufacturer FROM network_devices WHERE device_type = 'Switch' OR device_type = 'Router';
SELECT * FROM network_configurations;
SELECT id, ip_address, gateway FROM network_configurations WHERE subnet_mask = '255.255.255.0';
SELECT COUNT(*) AS total_rules FROM firewall_rules;
SELECT log_id, log_time, severity FROM monitoring_logs ORDER BY log_time DESC;
SELECT username, role, department FROM user_permissions WHERE permission_level = 'admin';
SELECT * FROM network_configurations WHERE ip_address = '192.168.1.1';
SELECT rule_name, rule_description FROM firewall_rules WHERE rule_id > 10 ORDER BY rule_id DESC;
SELECT log_time, severity, log_message FROM monitoring_logs WHERE severity = 'ERROR' AND source_ip = '10.0.0.1' ORDER BY log_time ASC;
SELECT device_name, device_type, manufacturer FROM device_inventory ORDER BY device_name, manufacturer DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT user_id, username, role, department FROM user_permissions WHERE permission_level = 'ADMIN'
